 31 -class Sensor(Component): 

 32      """ 
 33      Base class for all IMU sensor classes. 
 34   
 35      @ivar platform: L{Platform} this sensor is attached to. 
 36      @ivar trajectory: L{OffsetTrajectory} followed by this sensor. 
 37      """ 
 38   
 39      __metaclass__ = ABCMeta 
 40   

 41 -    def __init__(self, platform, positionOffset=vector(0,0,0), 
 42              rotationOffset=Quaternion(1,0,0,0)): 

 43          """ 
 44          Initialise sensor. 
 45   
 46          @param platform: L{Platform} this sensor will be attached to. 
 47          @param positionOffset: Position offset vector of this sensor 
 48              in the local co-ordinate frame of its host platform. 
 49          @param rotationOffset: Rotation offset quaternion of this sensor 
 50              in the local co-ordinate frame of its host platform. 
 51          """ 
 52          self._positionOffset = positionOffset 
 53          self._rotationOffset = rotationOffset 
 54          Component.__init__(self, platform) 

 55   

 56 -    def _trajectoryChange(self): 

 57          parentTrajectory = self.platform.trajectory 
 58          if parentTrajectory is None: 
 59              self.trajectory = None 
 60          else: 
 61              self.trajectory = OffsetTrajectory(parentTrajectory, 
 62                  self._positionOffset, self._rotationOffset) 

 63   
 64      @abstractmethod 

 65 -    def trueValues(self, t): 

 66          """ 
 67          Get true values of the intended sensed quantity at given times. 
 68   
 69          @param t: time(s) at which to measure. 
 70   
 71          @return: 3xN L{np.ndarray} of true values, where N = len(t). 
 72          """ 
 73          pass 

 74   
 75      @abstractmethod 

 76 -    def sensedVoltages(self, t): 

 77          """ 
 78          Get output voltages at given times. 
 79   
 80          This function should include all deterministic effects in the sensor, 
 81          but not random noise. 
 82   
 83          @param t: time(s) at which to measure. 
 84   
 85          @return: 3xN L{np.ndarray} of output voltages, where N = len(t). 
 86          """ 
 87          pass 

 88   
 89      @abstractmethod 

 90 -    def noiseVoltages(self, t): 

 91          """ 
 92          Generate non-deterministic noise to be added to output voltages. 
 93   
 94          @param t: time(s) at which measurements were taken, len(t) = N. 
 95   
 96          @return: 3xN L{np.ndarray} of noise voltages. 
 97          """ 
 98          pass 

 99   

100 -    def voltages(self, t): 

101          """ 
102          Generate output voltages of the sensor at given times, including noise. 
103          """ 
104          return self.sensedVoltages(t) + self.noiseVoltages(t)

106 -class IdealSensor(Sensor): 

107      """ 
108      An ideal sensor with unity transfer function and no noise. 
109      """ 
110   

111 -    def sensedVoltages(self, t): 

112          return self.trueValues(t)

114 -    def noiseVoltages(self, t):

117 -class NoisySensor(Sensor): 

118      """ 
119      An sensor with additive white Gaussian noise. 
120      """ 
121   
122      @prepend_method_doc(Sensor) 

123 -    def __init__(self, platform, noiseStdDev, **kwargs): 

124          """ 
125          @param noiseStdDev: Standard deviation of measurement noise. 
126          """ 
127          Sensor.__init__(self, platform, **kwargs) 
128          self._noiseStdDev = noiseStdDev 

129   

130 -    def _simulationChange(self): 

131          Sensor._simulationChange(self) 
132          if self.platform.simulation is None: 
133              self._rng = None 
134          else: 
135              self._rng = self.platform.simulation.subrng() 

136   

137 -    def noiseVoltages(self, t): 

138          return self._rng.normal(size=(3,1), scale=self._noiseStdDev)

140 -class TransformedSensor(Sensor): 

141      """ 
142      An sensor with an affine transform transfer function.

146 -    def __init__(self, platform, matrix=np.eye(3), offset=np.zeros((3,1)), 
147              **kwargs): 

148          """ 
149          @param matrix: 3x3 matrix to transform true values. 
150          @param offset: 3x1 offset to be added after matrix multiplication. 
151          """ 
152          Sensor.__init__(self, platform, **kwargs) 
153          self._transform = AffineTransform(transform=matrix, translation=offset) 

154   

155 -    def sensedVoltages(self, t): 

156          return self._transform.apply(self.trueValues(t))
